Verses: 1 saaraal Nootru Irubaththezhu Varusham Uyirodirundhaal; Ivvalave Saaraaludaiya Vayadhu.
2 kaanaan Dhesaththilulla Ebiron Ennum Keeriyaadharpaavile Saaraal Mariththaal; Appozhudhu Aabiragaam Vandhu, Saaraalukkaagap Pulambi Azhudhaan.
3 pinbu Aabiragaam Predham Irundha Idaththilirundhu Ezhundhupoi, Eththin Puththirarode Pesi:

4 naan Ungalidaththil Anniyanum Paradhesiyumaai Irukkiren; Ennidaththilirukkira Indhap Predham En Kanmun Iraadhapadikku Naan Adhai Adakkampannuvadharku, Ungalidaththil Enakku Sondhamaaga Oru Kallaraip Boomiyaith Tharavendum Endraan.
5 adharku Eththin Puththirar Aabiragaamukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga:

6 engal Aandavane, Naangal Sollugiradhaik Kelum; Engalukkulle Neer Magaa Prabu, Engal Kallaraigalil Mukkiyamaanadhile Predhaththai Adakkampannum; Neer Predhaththai Adakkampanna Engalil Oruvanum Than Kallaraiyai Umakkuth Thadaiseyvadhillai Endraargal.
7 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Ezhundhirundhu, Eththin Puththiraraagiya Aththesaththaarukku Vandhanam Seydhu,
8 avargalode Pesi: Ennidaththilirukkira Predham En Kanmun Iraadhapadikku, Naan Adhai Adakkampanna Ungalukku Sammadhiyaanaal, Neengal En Vaarththaiyaik Kettu, Sokaarudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Epperon,

9 than Nilaththin Kadaisiyile Irukkira Makpelaa Ennappatta Kugaiyai Enakku Sondhamaana Kallarai Boomiyaayirukkumpadi Tharavendum Endru, Avaridaththil Enakkaaga Vendikkollungal; Adhu Perumaana Vilaikku Avar Adhaith Tharuvaaraaga Endraan.

10 epperon Eththin Puththirar Naduvile Utkaarndhirundhaan; Appozhudhu Eththiyanaagiya Epperon Than Oor Vaasalukkul Pravesikkira Eththin Puththirar Anaivarum Ketka Aabiragaamukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga:

11 appadiyalla, En Aandavane, En Vaarththaiyaik Kelum; Andha Nilaththai Umakkuth Tharugiren, Adhilirukkum Kugaiyaiyum Umakkuth Tharugiren, En Janappuththirarudaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Adhai Umakkuth Tharugiren, Ummidaththilirukkira Predhaththai Adakkampannum Endraan.
12 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Aththesaththaarukku Vandhanam Seydhu,

13 dhesaththu Janangal Ketka, Epperonai Nokki: Kodukka Umakku Manadhaanaal En Vaarththaiyaik Kelum; Nilaththin Vilaiyaith Tharugiren; En Kaiyil Adhai Vaangikkollum; Appozhudhu Ennidaththilirukkira Predhaththai Avvidaththil Adakkampannuven Endraan.
14 adharku Epperon Aabiragaamukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
15 en Aandavane, Naan Sollugiradhaik Kelum; Andha Nilam Naanooru Sekkal Nirai Velli Perum; Enakkum Umakkum Adhu Evvalavu Kaariyam; Neer Ummidaththilirukkira Predhaththai Adakkampannum Endraan.

16 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Epperonin Sollaik Kettu, Eththin Puththirarukku Munbaaga Epperon Sonnapadiye, Varththagaridaththil Sellumpadiyaana Naanooru Sekkal Nirai Velliyai Avanukku Niruththuk Koduththaan.
17 indhappragaaram Mamrekku Edhire Makpelaavilulla Epperonudaiya Nilamaagiya Andha Boomiyum, Adhilulla Kugaiyum, Nilaththin Ellaiyengum Soozhndhirukkira Marangal Adangalum,
18 avanudaiya Oorvaasalukkul Pravesikkum Eththin Puththirar Ellaarum Ariya Aabiragaamukku Sondhamaaga Urudhippaduththappattadhu.
19 adharkuppin Aabiragaam Than Manaiviyaagiya Saaraalaik Kaanaandhesaththil Epperon Oor Boomiyaana Mamrekku Edhire Irukkira Makpelaa Ennum Nilaththin Kugaiyile Adakkampanninaan.
20 ippadi Eththin Puththirar Kaiyil Kollappatta Andha Nilamum, Adhilulla Kugaiyum, Aabiragaamukku Sondha Kallarai Boomiyaaga Urudhippaduththappattadhu.
